commit.message:
emit-rtl.c (emit_*_scope): Only access INSN_SCOPE if active_insn_p.

2002-06-11  David S. Miller  <davem@redhat.com>

	* emit-rtl.c (emit_*_scope): Only access INSN_SCOPE if
	active_insn_p.

From-SVN: r54545

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@

+
+	* emit-rtl.c (emit_*_scope): Only access INSN_SCOPE if
+	active_insn_p.
